1120007285655392256.text: Happy Passover! In 1977 MIT professor Ron Rivest came home after a Manischewitz-filled sedar and couldn’t sleep - so he stayed up & wrote an entire paper that became the basis for RSA encryption: https://bit.ly/2PAMAs5  v/(@Calderbank160O @UChicago) #tdihpic.twitter.com/LkrduDtzqw

1119794980879360000.text: Online commenting amnesia: How often do you come across an online comment that is provably yours (uncompromised account, reliable archives, in character, etc) and yet have no memory of writing it?

657993509035634689.text:
We take your privacy seriously.
Seriously, we take your privacy.
You know how seriously a mosquito takes your blood?
Like, that seriously.
